title: An Act to establish a November holiday honoring President John F. Kennedy, to promote increased voter participation and civic engagement

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Feeney, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2147) of Paul R. Feeney for legislation to establish a November holiday honoring President John F. Kennedy, to promote increased voter participation and civic engagement.  State Administration and Regulatory Oversight.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

related_entities.name: committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 06/04/2025 from 11:00 AM-05:00 PM in Gardner Auditorium
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

related_entities.name: committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently
the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently
